title: [K-12] Online Medical School Education Evaluation Tool Development Project

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of basic medical education and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in a BYOD environment, with the goal of developing online learning design evaluation tools for medical education

learning_goals: Draft a questionnaire measuring evaluation items of an online medical education module on a 5-point Likert scale with over 80% team completion.
Verify the readability and interpretive consistency of survey items with over 90% user comprehension.
Establish a process for applying the developed assessment tool to at least three actual e-learning modules to collect data and analyze results.
Derive the usefulness and improvement points of the assessment tool through focus group discussions, based on over 85% participant satisfaction criteria.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
